description: A resource that has been registered in the CloudFormation Registry.

LogGroupName.description: The Amazon CloudWatch log group to which CloudFormation sends error logging information when invoking the type's handlers.
LogGroupName.markdownDescription:
The Amazon CloudWatch log group to which CloudFormation sends error logging information when invoking the type's handlers.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 512  
Pattern: ^[\.\-_/#A-Za-z0-9]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

LogRoleArn.description: The ARN of the role that CloudFormation should assume when sending log entries to CloudWatch logs.
LogRoleArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the role that CloudFormation should assume when sending log entries to CloudWatch logs.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

LoggingConfig.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ExecutionRoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM execution role to use to register the type. If your resource type calls AWS APIs in any of its handlers, you must create an IAM execution role that includes the necessary permissions to call those AWS APIs, and provision that execution role in your account. CloudFormation then assumes that execution role to provide your resource type with the appropriate credentials.
ExecutionRoleArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM execution role to use to register the type. If your resource type calls AWS APIs in any of its handlers, you must create an IAM execution role that includes the necessary permissions to call those AWS APIs, and provision that execution role in your account. CloudFormation then assumes that execution role to provide your resource type with the appropriate credentials.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

LoggingConfig.description: Specifies logging configuration information for a type.
LoggingConfig.markdownDescription:
Specifies logging configuration information for a type.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: Replacement

SchemaHandlerPackage.description:
A url to the S3 bucket containing the schema handler package that contains the schema, event handlers, and associated files for the type you want to register.

For information on generating a schema handler package for the type you want to register, see submit in the CloudFormation CLI User Guide.
SchemaHandlerPackage.markdownDescription:
A url to the S3 bucket containing the schema handler package that contains the schema, event handlers, and associated files for the type you want to register.

For information on generating a schema handler package for the type you want to register, see submit in the CloudFormation CLI User Guide.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

TypeName.description:
The name of the type being registered.

We recommend that type names adhere to the following pattern: company_or_organization::service::type.
TypeName.markdownDescription:
The name of the type being registered.

We recommend that type names adhere to the following pattern: company_or_organization::service::type.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}::[A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}::[A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}$  
Update requires: Replacement

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the type, here the ResourceVersion. This is used to uniquely identify a ResourceVersion resource
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the type, here the ResourceVersion. This is used to uniquely identify a ResourceVersion resource

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[A-Za-z0-9-]{0,64}:cloudformation:[A-Za-z0-9-]{1,64}:([0-9]{12})?:type/resource/.+$  
Update requires: No interruption

TypeArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the type without the versionID.
TypeArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the type without the versionID.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[A-Za-z0-9-]{0,64}:cloudformation:[A-Za-z0-9-]{1,64}:([0-9]{12})?:type/resource/.+$  
Update requires: No interruption

IsDefaultVersion.description: Indicates if this type version is the current default version
IsDefaultVersion.markdownDescription:
Indicates if this type version is the current default version

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

ProvisioningType.description: The provisioning behavior of the type. AWS CloudFormation determines the provisioning type during registration, based on the types of handlers in the schema handler package submitted.
ProvisioningType.markdownDescription:
The provisioning behavior of the type. AWS CloudFormation determines the provisioning type during registration, based on the types of handlers in the schema handler package submitted.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: NON_PROVISIONABLE | IMMUTABLE | FULLY_MUTABLE  
Update requires: No interruption

VersionId.description: The ID of the version of the type represented by this resource instance.
VersionId.markdownDescription:
The ID of the version of the type represented by this resource instance.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[A-Za-z0-9-]{1,128}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Visibility.description:
The scope at which the type is visible and usable in CloudFormation operations.

Valid values include:

PRIVATE: The type is only visible and usable within the account in which it is registered. Currently, AWS CloudFormation marks any types you register as PRIVATE.

PUBLIC: The type is publically visible and usable within any Amazon account.
Visibility.markdownDescription:
The scope at which the type is visible and usable in CloudFormation operations.

Valid values include:

PRIVATE: The type is only visible and usable within the account in which it is registered. Currently, AWS CloudFormation marks any types you register as PRIVATE.

PUBLIC: The type is publically visible and usable within any Amazon account.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: PUBLIC | PRIVATE  
Update requires: No interruption
